description: Deals regular damage.

death break
perform finish
</Target Action>

}
</Before Eval>

note:

  $gameTroop.members()[k].addState(12);
  $gameTroop.members()[k].setStateTurns(12, 2);
}
</After Eval>
<Target Action>
perform action
action animation: allies
wait for animation
action effect: target
death break
perform finish
</Target Action>

name: Poison Blast
note: <State 10 Turns: +4>

name: Cleave
note:
<Cooldown: 1>
<Before Eval>
var targetNumber = -1;
for(var i = 0; i < $gameTroop.members().length; i++){
  if(target == $gameTroop.members()[i]){
    targetNumber = i;
    break;
  }
}
if(targetNumber != -1) {
  if(targetNumber - 1 != -1) {
    if(user.hit - $gameTroop.members()[targetNumber - 1].eva >= Math.random()){
      $gameTroop.members()[targetNumber - 1].gainHp(-0.3 * (user.atk - $gameTroop.members()[targetNumber - 1].def));
  }}
  if(targetNumber + 1 != $gameTroop.members().length) {
    if(user.hit - $gameTroop.members()[targetNumber + 1].eva >= Math.random()){
      $gameTroop.members()[targetNumber + 1].gainHp(-0.3 * (user.atk - $gameTroop.members()[targetNumber + 1].def));
  }}
}
</Before Eval>

name: Whirlwind
note: <Cooldown: 1>

name: Great Cleave
note:
<Cooldown: 1>
<Before Eval>
var targetNumber = -1;
for(var i = 0; i < $gameTroop.members().length; i++){
  if(target == $gameTroop.members()[i]){
    targetNumber = i;
    break;
  }
}
if(targetNumber != -1) {
  if(targetNumber - 1 != -1) {
    if(user.hit - $gameTroop.members()[targetNumber - 1].eva >= Math.random()){
      $gameTroop.members()[targetNumber - 1].gainHp(-0.5 * (user.atk - $gameTroop.members()[targetNumber - 1].def));
  }}
  if(targetNumber + 1 != $gameTroop.members().length) {
    if(user.hit - $gameTroop.members()[targetNumber + 1].eva >= Math.random()){
      $gameTroop.members()[targetNumber + 1].gainHp(-0.5 * (user.atk - $gameTroop.members()[targetNumber + 1].def));
  }}
}
</Before Eval>

name: Dissonance
note:
<After Eval>
for(var i = 0; i < $gameTroop.aliveMembers().length; i++) {
  if($gameTroop.aliveMembers()[i] !== user){
    var action = new Game_Action($gameTroop.aliveMembers()[i], null);
    action.setSkill(61);
    action.apply($gameParty.randomTarget());
    if (user.isDead()) {
      user.performCollapse();
}}}
</After Eval>

name: Power Chord
note:
<After Eval>
for(var i = 0; i < $gameTroop.aliveMembers().length; i++) {
    var action = new Game_Action($gameTroop.aliveMembers()[i], null);
    action.setSkill(9);
    action.apply($gameParty.randomTarget());
    if (user.isDead()) {
      user.performCollapse();
}}
</After Eval>

name: Epic Solo
note:
<Before Eval>
console.log("healing");
for(var i = 0; i < $gameTroop.members().length; i++) {
  $gameTroop.members()[i].gainHp($gameTroop.members()[i].isAlive() ? 25 : 1000);
}
</Before Eval>
